thread.title: ‘Greater Tuna’ star Jaston Williams lets loose in new one-man show
thread.title_full: ‘Greater Tuna’ star Jaston Williams lets loose in new one-man show | Dallas Morning News

author: Churnin
title: ‘Greater Tuna’ star Jaston Williams lets loose in new one-man show
text:
Texas’ own Jaston Williams, co-creator of the wildly popular Greater Tuna series and recipient of the 2013 Texas Medal of the Arts, is bringing his well-received new solo show, about his life onstage and behind the scenes in the 1970s, to the Eisemann Center.
Called Maid Marian in a Stolen Car , it’s the story of what it was like for a boy who loved show tunes to try to fit into sports-mad
West Texas. It includes his experience in a San Antonio production of Hamlet that he compares to the Battle of the Alamo and, of course, the creation of the Tuna plays.
Oct. 22-25 at the Eisemann Center, 2351 Performance Drive, Richardson. $38-$45. 972-744-4650. eisemanncenter.com.
Twitter: @nchurnin
